text: The Niue Assembly is the legislature of Niue. It is made up of 20 members; 14 representatives of the villages and 6 elected on a common roll. Members are directly elected by universal suffrage, and serve a three-year term.Island Territories: Niue Island in Te Ara: An Encyclopaedia of New Zealand, edited by A. H. McLintock, originally published in 1966. ==References== Category:Niue Category:Unicameral legislatures
title: Niue Assembly
